languages.text: {n}На лица бойцов ложится печать праведного негодования и готовности истребить тех, кто посягнул на покой почтенных мертвецов династии и предал Человечество. Ваша {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}проповедь{/d} воспламеняет их.{/n}

{n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На лица бойцов ложится печать праведного негодования и готовности истребить тех, кто посягнул на покой почтенных мертвецов династии и предал Человечество. Ваша {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}проповедь{/d} воспламеняет их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Their faces fill with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who have dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent reposed. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In ihren Gesichtern lodert rechtschaffene Empörung und der Wunsch, die Verräter auszulöschen, die es gewagt haben, den Frieden der berühmtesten Toten der Dynastie zu stören. Deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Predigt{/d} hat in ihren Herzen ein Feuer entfacht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In ihren Gesichtern lodert rechtschaffene Empörung und der Wunsch, die Verräter auszulöschen, die es gewagt haben, den Frieden der berühmtesten Toten der Dynastie zu stören. Deine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Predigt{/d} hat in ihren Herzen ein Feuer entfacht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous lisez sur leurs visages une indignation mâtinée de ferveur et l'inébranlable volonté d'exterminer les traîtres qui ont osé souiller la sépulture des défunts les plus éminents de la dynastie. Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} semble avoir allumé une flamme dans leur cœur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous lisez sur leurs visages une indignation mâtinée de ferveur et l'inébranlable volonté d'exterminer les traîtres qui ont osé souiller la sépulture des défunts les plus éminents de la dynastie. Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} semble avoir allumé une flamme dans leur cœur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las caras de tu gente brillan con indignación justiciera y con el ansia de exterminar a los traidores que han profanado la santidad del descanso de los muertos más solemnes de la dinastía. Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermón{/d} ha hecho arder sus corazones.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las caras de tu gente brillan con indignación justiciera y con el ansia de exterminar a los traidores que han profanado la santidad del descanso de los muertos más solemnes de la dinastía. Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermón{/d} ha hecho arder sus corazones.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らの顔は義憤に輝き、望んで王朝で最も偉大な死者のサンクティティを侵した裏切り者を絶滅させようという意欲に燃えている。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}説教{/d}が、彼らの心に火をつけたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らの顔は義憤に輝き、望んで王朝で最も偉大な死者のサンクティティを侵した裏切り者を絶滅させようという意欲に燃えている。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}説教{/d}が、彼らの心に火をつけたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人脸上都充满了正义的激愤，渴望消灭那些胆敢玷污神圣死者的叛徒。你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}布道{/d}点燃了他们心中的烈焰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Their faces glow with righteous indignation and a drive to exterminate the traitors who dared to invade the sanctity of the dynasty's most eminent dead. Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}sermon{/d} has ignited a fire in their hearts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yüzleri iman dolu bir hiddetle ve hanedanlığın en yüce atalarının ölülerinin kutsallığına el uzatma cüreti gösteren hainleri yok etme arzusuyla parlıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Söylevin{/d}, kalplerinde bir ateş yaktı.{/n}
